name: Voice of the Ancestors
text: Action: Choose a character you control - play a [clan-lion] character from your dynasty discard pile as an attachment on the chosen character, reducing its cost by 1. Treat this attachment as if its printed text box were blank. It gains the Spirit trait and the text: "Limit 1 Spirit per character. Add this card's printed [conflict-military] and [conflict-political] skill values to those of attached character."
